Posts.Content: My Mum is currently undergoing chemotherapy with Herceptin for Breast Cancer. Can she take the below herbals or anti-oxidant supplements while undergoing chemotherapy? Gingseng tea Reishi Mushroom tablets - from Pharmanex Greentea tablets - from Pharmanex Chaga mushroom powder Namocurcumin ( tumeric in the nanorechnology) Soursop leaf and juice Vitamins - Lifepak Nano from Pharmanex Your help would be greatly appreciated.
Posts.Title: Herbals and anti-oxidant while undergoing chemotherapy

Posts.Content: It is something more than the worst pain ever. My whole life turned to darkest Once I heard the bad new from my mom's oncologist as her time is running out shortly.. My life is upside down. It breaks my heart. It cant be any more pain. I have cried my eyes out all days and nights. But I still believe in a miracle. My mom - love of my life - has been diagnosed stage4 grade2 Her2 positive breast cancer with the bone metastatic. She got the ulcerating breast with terrible infection. Any survivals around? I need your help. Please i need some advises.
Posts.Title: Pray for my mom. Survivals we need your strength.

Posts.Content: Hi Laura Thank you for reply. It's really great. It gives us more hope to see you still doing well. You dont know how it means to us. Even her oncologist told me her case is really bad as it spreads to mant of the bone. But hopefully she will get over it, specially with the hope from survivals. She will start with Herceptin and chemo this week. Hope it's going well. Do you have any advises for preparing before chemo? And how the effects gonna be. I hope you all the best and live stronger for long. Hope that sooner we will find the cure for it. Thank you again Laura Doris
Posts.Title: Pray for my mom. Survivals we need your strength.

Posts.Content: On Sep 19, 2014 3:02 AM Ehypwnms wrote: I will be praying for you and your mom. I lost my mom in 2005. I know exactly how you are feeling right now. My mom was diagnosed at 32 and lost her fight at the age of 40, not the same type of Brest cancer though as your mom. I'm so sorry. Great big hugs your way.Thanks Ehy for your praying. Im so sorry about your mom. Hope she rest in peace now. I know there is no cure for cancer yet. But at least im hoping for a longer time she stay with me. I try my best to keep her stronger and live for next more years. Believe, hope and pray.
Posts.Title: Pray for my mom. Survivals we need your strength.
